comment_data.body:
As far I can see in Wireshark: Yes.
But I'm not able to send messages.
Messages are sending fine for me from a PHP based web server.
The example code does not work for me. The login works but the server does not react after the transmission of the nickname or any other messages.
That's what I see if I use an incorrect login or password, it'll halt for several seconds, and then disconnect.

If this works for you, could you please open a pull request?

Where exactly does your "my code" come in place? When I remove the charset from the response my script does nothing anymore...

Uh I'm don't know how github works. However my codes replaced lines 204-206 in whatsapp.v2.php.
Does I need to install any git software? I have only installed the good old SVN :-)
I have the same issue. Can't login with iPhone credentials (password = md5 of reversed udid)

Seems like nobody has figured out yet how the password on an iOS device is being generated, so I wrote a little Python script that helps you reset it to a custom value: http://lukasklein.com/blog/custom-ios-whatsapp-password/

Resetting my password with the method @lukashed and @mo-mughrabi mentioned worked for me:

* I set my password to be my reversed and hashed IMEI. (This disabled my Android client).
* Then I enabled my Android client by standard method → SMS confirmation code.
* Eventually it worked with both API and Android.

You may find you are able to login using the API but not to send anything. As @hubail commented, «in some cases you may need to flush the incoming messages buffer in order to send». This can be achieved with `read()` twice or thrice in PHP or `s.recv(1024)` in Python.
@aesedepece I try to add read() , but still can't send any message , did you have any example for me ?
the solution of dsdsfga works for me

Would like to know what encoding I have to use to send german chars like "ßöäü". I tried out "ISO-8859-1", "ISO-8859-15" and "UTF-8". But no message appears. Without those chars everything works fine.

title: Is this version is able to login to whatsapp server??
